scripts.clean: rimraf dist; rimraf es; rimraf lib;
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs NODE_ENV=production  babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir lib --source-maps --extensions .ts,.tsx --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments
scripts.build:esm: cross-env BABEL_ENV=esm NODE_ENV=production  babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir es --source-maps --extensions .ts,.tsx --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments
scripts.watch: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs NODE_ENV=production babel src --watch --root-mode upward --out-dir lib --source-maps --extensions .ts,.tsx --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments
